content: buddy the bear toy crochet pattern 1 pattern notes work in continuous rounds using a stitch marker the toy is worked up by first making two legs then joining them together then working up the body and head other body parts are made and sewn on after the finished toy is about 25-27 cm tall from top of ear to toe if using materials specified in this crochet pattern feel free to use the yarn and matching crochet hook of your choice to make the bear the result will be bigger or smaller keeping the same proportion make sure you use a tight enough gauge to prevent large holes between the stitches if you have any problems understanding the pattern please feel free to contact me materials yarn 100% acrylic in three colours i used hayfield bonus dk 100% acrylic / machine washable colours used oatmeal white and fern green and a little bit of dark yarn to embroidery the nose 3 mm crochet hook polyester toy stuffing safety eyes stitch marker or piece of yarn tapestry needle scissors 1 2 abbreviations chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - decrease increase - increase fpdc - front post double_crochet bpdc - back post double_crochet legs you need 2 legs but only one of them has to be fastened off keep your hook in the other leg as we will join them together to make the body part leg #1 round 1 magic_ring ch1 does not count as a stitch 6sc into the magic_ring 6 st round 2 increase x 5 12 st round 3 1inc 1sc x 6 around 18 st round 4 1inc 2sc x 6 24 st round 5 to 15 single_crochet around 24 st cut the yarn leave a long tail and fasten_off leave a stitch marker in 2 3 leg #2 follow instructions for leg #1 remember do not fasten_off leave a stitch marker in continue joining instructionswhen finished both legs joining instructions both of the pieces have a total of 24 stitches each plus 1 stitch made after joining you will have a total of 50 stitches / 24 each leg and extra 1ch worked on both sides 1 + 24 + 1 + 24 = 50 round 16 join the legs step 1 - leg #2 chain 1 step 2 - single_crochet in leg #1 where the stitch marker is 1st stitch from the last round made step 3 - single_crochet around leg #1 24 st step 4 - single_crochet in one loop of the 1 chain created 1 st step 5 - single_crochet around leg #2 24 st step 6 - single_crochet on the other side of the 1 chain created 1 st total of 50st was made time to fill the legs with stuffing before moving to the body part 3 4 body continue working in rounds round 17 50sc around 50 st round 18 1inc 9sc x 5 55 st round 19 to 22 single_crochet
